summary: A conversion for the UNPB body with BBP of the Val Tirkai armor of TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - UNP by asianboy345
descriptionHtml:
English is not my native language so sorry for my mistakes.

A conversion for the UNPB body with BBP of the Val Tirkai armor of TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - UNP by asianboy345.

All credit goes to the original authors of the model and asianboy345 for the UNP conversion. I only changed a couple of files and made the armor stand-alone.

[youtube]JBIu3P0DxNM[/youtube][youtube]9U44nttDSTs[/youtube]
Thanks to hodilton and MrKrossFaith for these videos

Required mods (don\'t forget to endorse them):
The UNPB body replacer with BBP support: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/]UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/]Troublemakers Clothing[/url]

Does not work without BBP.

Installation:
- Use NMM as usual
- For manual installation open archive, extract the esp file and the meshes and textures folders into skyrim\\data folder.

How to get it:
- Craftable under orcish category
- console: help tirkai

Update 0.2: fixed gauntlets for beast races
Update 0.3: Minor fixes on fingers noticeable when casting spells. Will behave better than before, at least the fingers won\'t link themselves. It\'s far from perfect though. 

Credits and thanks:
asianboy345 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - UNP[/url]
En Masse Entertainment / Bluehole Studios for TERA Online game
calyps and xp32 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
author: belisariu
